message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper involves developing a Follow-Me capability on a wheeled robot using perception and navigation components based on a sensor suite of fisheye cameras, lidar, and IMU running on an ARM64 Embedded Linux platform that runs ROS2 natively. The perception package detects AR markers and/or IR beacons to track a person using AI algorithms such as particle filters and nonlinear optimization to extract the SE(3) information of the 2D feature. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.RO (Robotics), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
